about_the_game:
◆ Speed × Skill Card Battles!

The rules are simple. Just play cards from your hand that connect to the numbers on the field.
To claim victory, keeping an eye on your opponent’s situation is essential.
Will you play swiftly? Drop a series of cards at once? Or wait deliberately?
Strategize carefully while considering your own and your opponent’s hands and skills.
In addition to online battles, friend matches via password are also available.

◆ Another Key to Victory: "Skills"

With only two skills allowed per deck, when and how to use them is critical.
Skills include those that disrupt your opponent and those that enhance your own position.
Each character also has unique traits.
Some skills activate when specific board conditions are met, offering chances for a dramatic comeback based on how you use them!

◆ "Abilities" That Lead to Unexpected Developments

Separate from skills, decks are randomly assigned special effects called "Abilities."
The abilities assigned to cards are determined randomly at the start of a battle, so you may not be able to use the same strategy as in previous matches.
Adapt flexibly to the board’s situation and make the most of these abilities.

◆ Want to Get Stronger? Build Your Deck!

If you aim for even more satisfying victories, focus on building your deck.
Create a deck optimized for powerful combos, strong finishes, or endgame comebacks.
Leverage your characters’ unique traits to craft a deck that’s truly your own and take on the competition.

◇ SPEEDUS Is Still Evolving! ◇

The development team doesn’t consider this the final version.
We are planning additional updates, and SPEEDUS will continue to grow!
・Enhanced overall graphics
・Additional downloadable content, and more!
We need your support to make this happen, so invite your friends and enjoy SPEEDUS online together!!

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: x64 Architecture Supporting the SSE2 Instruction Set
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "SPEEDUS -SHEDDING SPEED CARD" is a competitive card battle game based on the classic card game "Speed." Quickly play cards from your hand that connect to the numbers on the field! Utilize skills and abilities to your advantage—the player who empties their deck and hand first wins!
